snippet.title: Nintendo Switch, Steam 「Koumajou Remilia Scarlet Symphony」 Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Official Teaser site : https://cfk.kr/koumajou/en.php
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1229880/

The legendary action game, based on Touhou Project
and developed by Frontier Aja, comes back with upgrades! 

Play as Reimu Hakurei and head to the Scarlet Devil Castle
to find out the cause of Gensokyo's mysterious 「Disturbance」!

Join in the adventure turned more exciting
with HD remastered graphics and a number of bonus content!
Coming soon to Nintendo Switch and Steam!

©Team Shanghai Alice
© 2021 Frontier Aja All Rights Reserved. Published by CFK.
